title: Kitchen Short Cut Pre-Scooped Ice Cream

http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/bbb-video/kitchen-short-cut-pre-scooped-ice-cream/
Sam the Cooking Guy shares a short cut for preparing ice cream before your company arrives.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/bbb-video/kitchen-short-cut-pre-scooped-ice-cream/
Sam the Cooking Guy shares a short cut for preparing ice cream before your company arrives.

transcripts: Instead of hassling at the last minute with ice cream, try this simple trick. Scoop the ice cream into bowls a least an hour ahead of time and place into the freezer. Then when you need them, remove and add your toppings. And what's cool is when you add something warm, the ice cream won't melt right away. Simple. Efficient. Delicious.
